restartInTask() - Method in class com.ftdi.j2xx.FT_Device
Restarts the driver's IN thread following a successful call to FT_Device.stopInTask() Remarks: This function is used to restart the driver's IN task (read) after it has been stopped by a call to FT_Device.stopInTask().
